Example 199
(how alignments are represented is altered)
......

| abc | defghi |
:-: | -----------:
bar | baz

......

<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th style="text-align:center">abc</th>
<th style="text-align:right">defghi</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">bar</td>
<td style="text-align:right">baz</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
